extendedInfo.description: Nominated for the German game developers award in the categories "Best mobile game 2011" and "Best handheld game 2011". â¢ Reviews: Gamezebo 4,5 of 5 stars: "...lots of innovation and challenge and the ability to put a smile on your face. Itâs that rare app that absolutely should be an important part of your collection" http://bit.ly/oq1h7c â¢ Pocketgamer 8/10, MacLife 4/5, GamingXP 9/10 and many more... Welcome to Crazy Rings in glorious HD! An incredible adventure: Classic, fun game play - revolutionized! Riots in zoos all around the world! Stop the stampede - Play Crazy Rings! Play the first 37 stages without interruption and then 1 stage per day completely FREE! â¢ Over 100 levels of fun, hours of entertainment!  â¢ Amazing extras like the flying hambone and the all-mighty carrot! â¢ Awesome game play and ideas, tailor-made for touch devices! â¢ 3 game play modes: The Campaign, Zen Mode and Free Play â¢ Hilarious characters and vivid presentation! â¢ Profiles - Your girl/boyfriend wants to play too? No need to delete your progress! â¢ Global High Score List!â¢ Completely new: The always available Rocket Rings! Get Crazy Rings today! You will love it!

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Music is Great and sets the perfect mood for the game.  The black man giving encouragement in the background is just  Brilliantly funny too.  5.999 stars.  Thank You!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: It is a very good game i like it so much it is very easy to play i also told my friends to download this game they said thank u for telling a nice game i love this game

reviews.title: Game won\'t open...
reviews.comment: I just get a blank screen. Dell streak running android 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: It starts off by forcing closed several times before you even begin. Then it starts off a little fast then gets slow then doesn\'t react quickly. It is ok if you can fix the glitches for androids
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: My mother played this in my XTouch and she loved it and still in my new tablet!3 stars cause i don\'t like that we have to wait too long for next turn
reviews.author: Mohammad Usman Sohail Khalid

reviews.title: I really like this game...
reviews.comment: But if you added some music to play while you\'re matching I would like it even more.
reviews.author: Eric Haas

reviews.title: AWESOME GAME!
reviews.comment: Love this game. Fun to play. Great sound effects. Wonderful graphics. Challenging. Can purchase for only 99\302\242 so you don\'t have to wait to play the levels. With a game this great, have no issues supporting the developers. Highly recommend! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: So fun I love it I think that you should get. I think its very fun but gets harder and harder each level so if your up for a little challenge get this fantastic ,cool , funny , and amazing game
reviews.author: Marissa James

reviews.title: Super excellent
reviews.comment: Why I rate five cause I ever play til level 78 on sanding tab 2
reviews.author: Magnus Ydaz

reviews.title: Not horrible but not great
reviews.comment: Best to play when u hav absolutly nothing to do. I couldn\'t give it one star and I couldn\'t give it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It Sucks
reviews.comment: It gets you all into the game and then you have to wait 13 hrs. Just to play 1 turn, then 15 hrs. With 1 turn, then 17 hrs. With one then! It\'s fun but not fun enough to wait for, for 1 play! O and then you can\'t even play with levels you already played without waiting those hours! Seriously delete and NO stars!  Only got 1 cause it made me to comment!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crazy, excellent, u rock
reviews.comment: Awesome game I got addicted to this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: bummer
reviews.comment: I actually really like this game, but only being able to play 1 level every 24 hours, and the program running in the background draining battery and power made this no longer fun. Am uninstalling this and looking for a new addiction.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: I think the developer over estimates this app. Who\'s going to wait hours to play the next stage? This game is old now, UNINSTALL.  If you have played the first 10 stages, don\'t pay. It is repetitive.
reviews.author: Shane Archer

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I sat in the kids bit in the apple store and played this for three hours on ipad

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It is fun

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.comment: I love this game! If u have a constant internet connection wid no interruption during download u can play this game with no worries

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: Can\'t keep from coming back for another round.
